name: Camper Jumper Simulator
description: Camper Jumper Simulator is a crazy, racing game with lots of puzzles to discover and solve. Challenging trails with lost of shortcuts that must be found to win. Lots of hidden secrets and challenges!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Pentium 4 / AMD Athlon 64 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 600 series or AMD R7 series DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
